name: neodify
description: 基于 Claude Agent SDK 的 Agent 运行框架

scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,server -c cyan,green "npm run dev -w @neodify/web -- --mode development" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev -w @neodify/server"
scripts.start: concurrently -n web,server -c cyan,green "npm run preview -w @neodify/web -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4173 --mode production" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start -w @neodify/server"
